body: Uncommon Sense reports that "State Security agents this week have been warning parishes in Havana to not celebrate Masses to commemorate the anniversary of the death of Orlando Zapata Tamayo."
original_body: Uncommon Sense reports that "State Security agents this week have been warning parishes in Havana to not celebrate Masses to commemorate the anniversary of the death of Orlando Zapata Tamayo."
title: Cuba: Masses for Tamayo

sentence: Uncommon Sense reports that "State Security agents this week have been warning parishes in Havana to not celebrate Masses to commemorate the anniversary of the death of Orlando Zapata Tamayo."
